title: Enhanced form action error is only shown when a layout is present.
body:
### Describe the bug

### Description
When submitting a form an error is thrown but it is only displayed when a layout is present. Without the layout, the error is not displayed unless the `use:enhance` option is removed.


### Expected Behavior

The error should be displayed regardless of whether a layout is present or `use:enhance` is used.

### Actual Behavior

The error is only displayed when a layout is present, or when `use:enhance` is removed.


### Reproduction

### Steps to Reproduce

1. Create a form with use:enhance.
2. Create a form action that throws an error.
3. Submit the form.
4. If a layout is present, the error is displayed. If not, the error is not displayed unless `use:enhance` is removed.

I create a setup here:

repository: https://github.com/eduardolagoeiro/sk-error-form-enhance
form: http://localhost:5173/my-form

To see the bug, remove the use:enhance and/or rename the `src/my-form/_+layout.svelte` to `src/my-form/+layout.svelte`
